description: It has been quite a year for Welsh sport - here are a dozen questions to see how well you remember some of the stories, personalities and quotes from 2024.
title: Welsh sport Christmas quiz: Test your memory of 2024
title_page: Welsh sport Christmas quiz: Test your memory of 2024 - BBC Sport
maintext:
It has been quite a year for Welsh sport - from the highs of football and Olympic successes to the lows of the national rugby teams.
So as we take time to reflect on the past 12 months this Christmas, here are a dozen questions to see how well you remember some of the stories, personalities and quotes from 2024.
